contextId.information: AT: "that I brought the Israelites to the promised land from the land of Egypt" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
AT: the angel stopped killing people." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: the angel put his sword back into its sheath

contextId.information: For all of the other people in the list, the text specifies that there were "twelve persons in number." Since this is implied, you may want to add this the statement about Joseph, as the UDB does. AT: "the first lot fell to Joseph's family, twelve persons in number" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: the first lot fell to Joseph's family

contextId.information: The word "you" here refers to David. AT: "just as you are committed this day" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
